PreceptDef.label: halved
PreceptDef.description: The honored have the privilege of calling upon their allies more frequently, their requests for aid met with a nod and a half a cost, easing the burden of leadership.

PreceptDef.label: doubled
PreceptDef.description: Every call for aid is a heavy toll, a demand of honor twice the usual rate. Such is the price of urgency, a cost only to be borne when the need is direst.
